sourcesContent: import logo from '../logo.svg'; // import '../index.css'; // import Card from './Card'; import Header from './Header'; import Main from './Main'; import Footer from './Footer'; function App() { handleEditAvatarClick = () => { const avatarEditModal = document.querySelector('.popup_type_avatar'); avatarEditModal.classList.add('popup_opened'); } handleEditProfileClick = () => { const profileEditModal = document.querySelector('.popup_type_edit'); profileEditModal.classList.add('popup_opened'); } handleAddPlaceClick = () => { const cardAddModal = document.querySelector('.popup_type_add-element'); cardAddModal.classList.add('popup_opened'); } return (
